ExpSyntax.val: 'RC09_How Do I Transfer Files Between the Server and the Client Machine?'

Text.val: The temp list will have a list of client files that can be copied.
After the copy is done, this will hold the location of the copied file
Fetch a list of files that the user can copy off the server.
This is executed on the server, before the list is presented on the client.
Create each entry for the list for the user.
Note that we don't recreate the list here: if the user has already changed the sort order, it will still be selected.
After the copy is done, this will hold the location of the copied file

ExpSyntax.val: ClientFileOpenDlg ('Select file to copy', Translate('%WorkingDir%Resources'), 'All files (*.*)|*.*', 'TRUE'LOG, 'FALSE'LOG)
CASE({0,3},0,'File copied',1,'Source file not found',2,'Destination file cannot be created',3,'Problem uploading','')
